analysis.description:
TokenERC20 (/unique_contracts/0x12c61e4706c0ce2ba3e72d8bab54e6e43cc6d4b7.sol#25-185) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_contracts/0x12c61e4706c0ce2ba3e72d8bab54e6e43cc6d4b7.sol#99-103)

Contract locking ether found in /unique_contracts/0x12c61e4706c0ce2ba3e72d8bab54e6e43cc6d4b7.sol:
	Contract CompetitionChainContract has payable functions:
	 - CompetitionChainContract (/unique_contracts/0x12c61e4706c0ce2ba3e72d8bab54e6e43cc6d4b7.sol#196-201)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

CompetitionChainContract.buyPrice should be constant (/unique_contracts/0x12c61e4706c0ce2ba3e72d8bab54e6e43cc6d4b7.sol#187-189)
